name: Trials (chinobistar)
description:
Trials is a first-person horror short game. It was developed as a college project, and was the first Unity game developed by the creators. The game was originally developed during the second half of 2015, and received some updates in January of 2019 prior to being published here.

In Trials, you take control of a man trying to find the exit of a mysterious house, haunted by an unknown entity. To do that, you must find the keys to open the doors of the house, while being chased by the entiy. Whenever you see something, run.
